total.title: Total CH₄ Emission
total.description: Total methane emission from microbial, fossil and pyrogenic sources.

microbial.title: Microbial CH₄ Emission
microbial.description: Emission of methane from all microbial sources, such as wetlands, agriculture and termites.

fossil.title: Fossil CH₄ Emission
fossil.description: Emission of methane from all fossil sources, such as oil and gas activities and coal mining.

pyrogenic.title: Pyrogenic CH₄ Emission
pyrogenic.description: Emission of methane from all sources of biomass burning, such as wildfires and crop residue burning.
